outputs.output_descr: Improved effectiveness of ESIA system, particulary for agriculture and forestry plantation sector , as a safegard for sustainable and climate resilient development. This project will implement in central and provincial level. Main activities will be the development of technical suidelines and capacity in reviewing ESIAs and monitoring the resulting managemetn plants.

project_descr: Poverty-Environment Initiative Phase 2 Lao PDR, Environment and Social Impact Assessment Component
project_title: Poverty-Environment Initiative Phase 2 Lao PDR, ESIA
